cs302.project4

Class Quadrant

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs302.project4.Shape
      • cs302.project4.Rectangle
        • cs302.project4.Square
          • cs302.project4.Quadrant
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AreaMeasurable, java.lang.Comparable<Shape>

    public class Quadrant
extends Square
implements AreaMeasurable
    This shape extend the square shape and create a 1/4 circle in the 4th quadrant, its origin is the center of the circle.
    Author:
    rickixie

      Constructors

      This is the default constructor for quadrant, which is a sub-type of square.

      Methods

      void draw(PortablePixmap p)
      This is the method for draw a shape that will go through all the pixels in the shapes and set the appropriate color for the corresponding position
      double getArea(PortablePixmap p)
      This method calculate a shape's actual area given the parameters of the PortablePixmap that the shape is drew.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Quadrant

        public Quadrant(java.awt.Color c,
        double originX,
        double originY,
        double sizeP)
         throws SVGFormatException
        This is the default constructor for quadrant, which is a sub-type of square. It takes parameters of its color, origins and shape specific area.
        Parameters:
        c - The Color of the shape
        originX - Origin X relative to the pixmap width
        originY - Origin Y relative to the pixmap height
        sizeP - The side length of the square in relative to pixmap width that will be used as the radius of the quarter circle
        Throws:
        SVGFormatException - if given size is negative
